title: Youtube Downloader
desc: a website for download a youtube videos with format your option, has two option that is mp3 and mp4. this website build with Exspress JS and SASS for the styling

title: NMOV
desc: a website for watch movies and trailer, this API build by me used Express (Result of scraping a web filmapik). This website build with Vanilla JavaScript and  Webpack. need to know, this web very slow because my API too many request video to the server.

title: API LK21
desc: a REST Server, this API will get information about movie from web LK21. this API build with Exspress.

title: API FILMAPIK
desc: a REST Server, this API will get information about movie and include videos link of google drive from web filmapik. this API build with Exspress.

title: Movie Trailer
desc: a website for displays information of movie, this is almost same with NMOV Project the difference is this website can't watch film, only watch trailer.
